lead_paragraph: Charges have been filed against Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva concerning dealings in Angola, but he is still a leading contender for president in 2018.

headline.print_headline: Ex-President of Brazil Faces New Charges
headline.main: Ex-President of Brazil Faces New Corruption Charges

snippet: Charges have been filed against Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva concerning dealings in Angola, but he is still a leading contender for president in 2018....
abstract: Federal prosecutors file corruption charges against former Brazilian Pres Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva; influential politician could face two separate trials on obstruction charges in connection with national oil company Petrobras and illegally benefiting from ties with Brazilian construction company OAS; filing deals significant blow to da Silva, but he remains leading contender for presidential election in 2018.
